pages.title: Mining Portals
pages.text: $(l)New Features in 1.18$()$(li)Five (5) Dimensions: Mining, Climbing, Caving, Hunting, and Nethering$(li)Mining, Climbing, and Caving now use the new 1.18 world height (384 to -64)$(li)Mining Dim has Deserts and Plains only, although hilly due to 1.18 changes$(li)Climbing Dim has Wind-swept Hills and Badlands only$(li)Caving Dim's surface block is now vanilla stone, instead

of Mycelium $(li)Free-standing portals as in previous versions$(li)Mining portal uses Deepslate$(li)Caving portal uses Tuff$(li)Teleporters have a "return to bed" feature when you sneak + right-click with the new Returning enchantment$(li)Additional deepslate diamond ore in Overworld, Mining, Climbing, and Caving.  Can be adjusted in config.  Default value is very modest.$(li)Additional ancient debris ore in Nether and Nethering Dims.

Can be adjusted in config.  Default value is very modest.$(li)New feature to bypass ocean check, and place a stone block under player if in water, bring a boat!$(br2)This chapter is taken from the $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/mining-dimensions-fabric)Mining Dimension$(/l) Curseforge page.

pages.title: Portable Teleporters
pages.text: Teleporters have a "return to bed" feature when you sneak + right-click with the new Returning enchantment
A dimensions with two biomes (desert and plains) and is always noon; same ores and structures as Overworld; made with deepslate and lit with flint-n-steel.
A dimensions with two biomes (badlands and wind-swept hills) and is always noon; same ores and structures as Overworld; made with snow blocks and lit with flint-n-steel.

A dimension with just plains, always dark, and full of juiced up, armored mobs; only vanilla ores; made with oak logs and lit with flint-n-steel; seriously, the mobs are tough and you will likely die!
A safe haven dimension of Mushroom biome caves; same ores as Overworld; made with tuff and lit with flint-n-steel; only spawns bats and the occasional spider spawner in mineshafts.
A vanilla-only Nether dimension, helpful for finding vanilla resources that are difficult to find when the regular Nether is filled with modded biomes.  Made with Basalt and lit with flint-n-steel.
